name: agent-describe
description: Describe a registered automation agent. Usage: agent-describe agent=<name>
command:
bash -lc '
set -euo pipefail
AGENT="${agent:-}" || true
FORMAT="${format:-text}"
if [ -z "$AGENT" ]; then
  echo "agent parameter is required (agent=<name>)" >&2
  exit 2
fi
cd /Users/freqkflag/Projects/GitHub/infra
python3 scripts/agents/run-agent.py describe "$AGENT" --format "$FORMAT"
'
